Articles.Content: does anyone have ksp version .21 that I can download I want to play old versions of ksp, here is proof of my ownership of ksp http://steamcommunity.com//id/scifi6546/. Thanks for your help! (mods do not ban me I am not pirating)
Unfortunately .21 isn't free to share or I'd send you mine, but you'd have to install Linux, sorry.
